subject: This is Mrs Linda Solomon , th
body:
This is Mrs Linda Solomon , the U.S Postmaster General. I want to bring to
your Notice that, on my routine Monthly investigation of every USPS And DHL
Office visiting, i discovered an abandoned Parcel containing an ATM
Card worth of IS ($4, 800,000,USD) in one of our offices. And when i made
inquiry of the reason it has not been mailed for the owner, i
discovered that the mailing information on the Parcel is not complete,
as the mailing information written on the form is just your name and
email address, as the Beneficiary only, no mailing address on it. The
Postmaster in that branch (Mr. Bernard Coleman) fail to mail it as
programmed, due to the incorrect information.
I have made the arrangement of mailing the ATM Card Parcel to you. So,
I'm sending you this message to get back with your current mailing
address to enable us to mail it for you.
Now, i want to mail the ATM Card Parcel for you by myself as i have
made the arrangement of mailing it to you. I discussed it with the
White House and all Homeland Securities including FBI and they have
all given me the go head order to mail it for you immediately, 
you
reconfirm your mailing address to this office in order for us to mail
the ATM Card directly to you after sending the mailing fee which is
ust US$55
Note, below is the officially information needed for posting of the
ATM CARD ASAP.
Full name:_____
Full mailing Address:_____
Your cell phone no:_____
Nationality:____
ID card copy
:___
We shall mail the ATM Card for you once you update us with the above
information and the Postal Stamp fee of US$ only via BTC or Steam Wallet card
US$55 or Apple  Gift Card of US$55 as a matter of
Urgency and Deliver you.
Best Regards,
MRS LINDA SOLOMON

subject: Re: This is Mrs Linda Solomon , th
body:
Hello Mrs. Linda Solomon,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the abandoned parcel containing an ATM card. I appreciate your efforts in trying to locate the rightful owner. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

Could you please provide more details about the ATM card? Is it linked to a specific bank or financial institution? Also, how did you come across my name and email address as the recipient of this parcel?

Additionally, I'm curious about the mailing fee you mentioned. Could you please explain why there is a fee involved and how it should be paid? Is there any way to verify the legitimacy of this transaction?

Thank you for your assistance in clarifying these matters.

Best wishes,
Maria
